rtega_mnemonic:
囑囑RS
嘱嘱		order, tell, instruct, leave word, request, entrust
  • mouth 口 ordering or instructing the lower classes 屬/属 which are being entrusted a task
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 嘱)
Pictophonetic: 屬 indicates the sound; 口 (mouth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
囑咐 [ zhǔ fù ]: to tell; to exhort; injunction
囑託 [ zhǔ tuō ]: to entrust a task to sb else

heisig_chinese_memo: Since children belong to parents they can get admonished when naughty things come out of their mouths.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Since children belong to parents they can get admonished when naughty things come out of their mouths.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " mouth ", " belonging " sound. " Enjoy " means exhort, exhort. "Jade articles. "Mouth": "Advice, pay advice." For example, Xiao Ye of the Tang Dynasty <Lingnan Jiedushi Wei Gong Shendao Stele>: "Fang is seriously ill, exhorting the following: "There is no thick burial. Useless preaching. No troubles in Yusi..." "Song History. Food and Commodities. "Taxation": "All donations, wills, and private burial sites are subject to deeds and taxation, and they get more than 4.67 million yuan in one year old."

" Advice " also means entrust or entrust. Such as "Shi Shuo Xin Yu. "Guzhen": "The old lady is dying, and the bride will be instructed by the young man, but not the young man!" Song Dynasty Mei Yaochen "Rufen Poor Girl": "Diligence and diligence to the neighbors, fortunately to be close together."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " mouth " to the sound of " belonging ". " Advice " means exhortation and also means entrustment.
humanum_full_description:
從「口」，「屬」聲。「囑」表示叮嚀、囑咐。《玉篇．口部》：「囑，付囑也。」如唐代蕭鄴〈嶺南節度使韋公神道碑〉：「方大病，囑其後曰：『無厚葬。無用鼓吹。無煩諡於有司。…』」《宋史．食貨志．賦稅》：「凡嫁資、遺囑及民間葬地，皆令投契納稅，一歲中得錢四百六十七萬餘引。」

　　「囑」又表示托付、委托。如《世說新語．規箴》：「昔夫人臨終，以小郎囑新婦，不以新婦囑小郎！」宋代梅堯臣〈汝墳貧女〉：「勤勤囑四鄰，幸願相依傍。」
humanum_short_description: 從「口」，「屬」聲。「囑」表示叮嚀，又表示托付。

Example Words:

囑託 [ zhǔ tuō ]: to entrust a task to sb else

從「 口 」，「 屬 」聲。「 囑 」表示叮嚀、囑咐。《玉篇．口部》：「囑，付囑也。」如唐代蕭鄴〈嶺南節度使韋公神道碑〉：「方大病，囑其後曰：『無厚葬。無用鼓吹。無煩諡於有司。…』」《宋史．食貨志．賦稅》：「凡嫁資、遺囑及民間葬地，皆令投契納稅，一歲中得錢四百六十七萬餘引。」 「 囑 」又表示托付、委托。如《世說新語．規箴》：「昔夫人臨終，以小郎囑新婦，不以新婦囑小郎！」宋代梅堯臣〈汝墳貧女〉：「勤勤囑四鄰，幸願相依傍。」
From " mouth", " belonging" sound. " Enjoy" means exhort, exhort. "Jade articles. "Mouth": "Advice, pay advice." For example, Xiao Ye of the Tang Dynasty : "Fang is seriously ill, exhorting the following: "There is no thick burial. Useless preaching. No troubles in Yusi..." "Song History. Food and Commodities. "Taxation": "All donations, wills, and private burial sites are subject to deeds and taxation, and they get more than 4.67 million yuan in one year old." " Advice" also means entrust or entrust. Such as "Shi Shuo Xin Yu. "Guzhen": "The old lady is dying, and the bride will be instructed by the young man, but not the young man!" Song Dynasty Mei Yaochen "Rufen Poor Girl": "Diligence and diligence to the neighbors, fortunately to be close together."

囑字的基本解释

囑
zhǔ
见“嘱”。

囑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǔ］
［《廣韻》之欲切，入燭，章。］
“嘱1”的繁体字。
(1)关照；叮嘱。
(2)托付；委托。

囑字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　囑； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页215第29
【廣韻】之欲切【集韻】朱欲切，?音燭。【玉篇】付囑也。【廣韻】託也。【字彙】俗作嘱。
